comments:
Build 20020313++
1. I went to the properties of the org.eclipse.debug.core project in my
workspace and set the launch configuration type to "Runtime workbench."
2. Now if I select the org.eclipse.debug.core project and click "Debug" the
following exception occurs. If I select a different project (one who's launch
configuration type is "none"), the launch config dialog still comes up correctly.

Under debug options I have configuration-style launching turned on and
single-click launching turned off.

java.lang.NullPointerException

Darin,

Why is ExecutionAction calling 'dispose' on PDE's tab when no tabs have been 
shown?

We can create a tab without creating its control. We do this for single click 
launching. We create tabs, ask them to init defaults in a config, and then 
dispose of them without ever needing their controls.

See the java doc class comment on ILaunchConfigurationTab
Sorry, my mistake (didn't read the Javadoc carefully). Fixed.
